Wrapping windows Resource Handles into smart references.

boost::shared_ptr is required. see boost.org for details.

The following HandleRefs are defined:

  • HIMAGELIST ==> CImageListRef
  • HMENU ==> CMenuRef
  • HANDLE ==> CHandleRef
  • HBITMAP ==> CBitmapRef
  • HBRUSH ==> CBrushRef
  • HPEN ==> CPenRef
  • HKEY ==> CHKeyRef

Todo:
Write a custom CDCRef, that can be (a) Do Nothing, (b) DeleteDC, or (c) ReleaseDC

#include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>

Data Structures

class  CHandleRefT
 Template class implementing a counted reference to a windows resource handle. More...

class  CDCRef
 HDC needs special handling, since there are two valid cleanups - DeleteDC - ReleaseDC. More...
